definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: With that overturned, the clan authority and the authority of the husband all begin to totter.
sentences.chinese: 它既被打翻，族權和夫權便一概跟着動搖起來。

sentences.english: The patriarchal culture has been various and complicated in manifestation.
sentences.chinese: 夫權文化表現形式非常複雜。

definition: forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
to be in overall charge/to oversee
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
Xiao He (-193 BC), famous strategist and chancellor, fought on Liu Bang's 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] side during the Chu-Han Contention 楚漢戰爭|楚汉战争[Chu3 Han4 Zhan4 zheng1]
to decide and act alone (idiom); to take arbitrary action/a law unto oneself
to save or redeem (a situation)/to mediate/to intercede
